programme.title: Mock the Week Christmas Special 2019

programme.title: Would I Lie to You?

programme.title: Big Zuu's Big Eats

programme.title: Border Force America's Gatekeepers

programme.desc: Missionary: Impossible: Homer pledges $10,000 to save his favourite British sitcom. But when the channel comes for the cash, he flees to a South Pacific island.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Citation Negation: Sheldon and Amy get some devastating news. Bernadette asks Stuart's girlfriend Denise to teach her how to beat Howard at a video game.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The VCR Illumination: Sheldon and Amy are still upset about their theory being disproven, but a video tape from Sheldon's past inspires him not to give up.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Paintball Scattering: Jealousy, trust issues and tension among the couples in the gang cause mayhem when Penny and Leonard organise a paintball game.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Twisted World of Marge Simpson: Marge opens a pretzel franchise after meeting the Pretzel Man (guest star Jack Lemmon). But Fat Tony wants a slice of the action.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Brand new series - Panic on the Streets of Springfield: Lisa develops an imaginary friendship with a morose British singer. Homer gets a powerful truck.

programme.title: New: Married at First Sight...
programme.desc: ...Australia: Brand new series: Ryan is under fire for his comments about Jacqui and their sex life, Morena's emotions run high and Awhina questions her relationship with Adrian.

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: Britain's sharpest armchair critics have been watching You, Coronation Street, Strictly Come Dancing, Celebrity Trash Monsters: What's Your Waste Size? and other top TV.

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: On the Box: A Nightmare on Elm Street 3: Dream Warriors, Sex, Love & Goop, Coronation Street, Strictly Come Dancing, The Cube, Celebrity Ghost Trip and This Morning.

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Bi-curious 75-year-old Ian from North Yorkshire is looking for the perfect partner to explore his sexuality with, and 30-year-old waiter Kerry wants an experimental man.

programme.title: Married at First Sight Australia
programme.desc: Brand new series: Ryan comes under fire for his comments about Jacqui and their sex life, Morena's emotions run high and Awhina is left questioning her relationship with Adrian.

programme.title: Rick and Morty [adult swim]
programme.desc: The Rickshank Rickdemption: Still in galactic prison, Rick puts an intricate escape plan into action. Back on Earth, Morty and Summer have an argument.

programme.title: New: Common Side Effects
programme.desc: (adult swim) Brand new series - Blowfish: Marshall is rescued by an inmate, but now owes him. Desperate to escape prison, he works on a risky plan when he runs into a surprising ally. (Ep7)

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: Britain's sharpest armchair critics have been watching You, Coronation Street, Strictly Come Dancing, Celebrity Trash Monsters: What's Your Waste Size? and other top TV.

programme.title: Abbott Elementary
programme.desc: Read-A-Thon: The competition heats up between Melissa and Janine as their classes go head-to-head in a read-a-thon sponsored by a local pizza shop.

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: Welcome to the Vow Renewal: The Johnsons decide to help Calvin and Tina have the wedding they missed out on the first time.

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: Welcome to Bowling: Calvin and Dave team up for a chance at bowling championship glory. Gemma and Tina face off.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Earthquake: An earthquake traps Claire in the bathroom with the plumber. Manny has an existential crisis while he's out with Jay.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Cafe 36: Gordon Ramsay visits Cafe 36 in Chicago. Husband-and-wife team Terry and Carol are stuck in the past and their head chef's lax attitude is driving away customers.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Phil on Wire: Jay's relationship with the dog irritates Gloria. Phil and Luke try to master the tightrope. Cameron starts a juice fast.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Door to Door: Jay helps Manny with a school fundraiser. Claire campaigns for a stop sign at a busy junction. Phil and Luke try to create a viral video. Gloria searches for Stella.

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube Shorts
programme.desc: A short, cheeky clip featuring animals and food, from the always hilarious Tube that is Rude.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay revisits some of the restaurants he set out to save, including The Mixing Bowl, The Olde Stone Mill, Peter's and Campania. Have things improved?

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Big Baby Ball: When Coach Mellor singles out Adam during dodgeball, Beverly intervenes and gets him fired. But then Murray and Adam see Mellor in a new light.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: A Goldberg Thanksgiving: Beverly challenges Erica to participate in Jazzercise after Erica says her mum's obsession is sad. Marvin visits the family at Thanksgiving.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Monster Isolation: After a terrible date with Lucy, Raj vows never to leave his flat again. Sheldon asks Penny to help him record a new episode of Fun with Flags.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Contractual Obligation Implementation: Leonard, Sheldon and Howard are forced to volunteer for a university committee. Raj plans a stress-free date with Lucy.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: A Lock-In, a Weather Girl and a Disgusting Habit: Sheldon acts as Mary's spy when he's forced to spend the night at church for a youth lock-in.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: A Pink Cadillac and a Glorious Tribal Dance: Sheldon attends his first comic book convention and Mary tries selling make-up.

programme.title: Married at First Sight Australia
programme.desc: Brand new series: Ryan comes under fire for his comments about Jacqui and their sex life, Morena's emotions run high and Awhina is left questioning her relationship with Adrian.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Reclusive Potential: A brilliant scientist invites Sheldon to his isolated cabin, and Leonard, Raj and Howard go along for the trip.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Comet Polarization: Sheldon isn't pleased by the comic book shop's new-found popularity. Raj tries to take the credit for Penny's astronomical discovery.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Monetary Insufficiency: Sheldon goes to Las Vegas to try to win money for science. Penny and Bernadette take Amy shopping for a wedding dress.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: White Trash, Holy Rollers and Punching People: The Coopers face judgement from the congregation in the wake of Georgie's pregnancy.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: A Clogged Pore, a Little Spanish and the Future: While Sheldon struggles to cope with the first signs of puberty, his parents both hunt for new jobs.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Come Fly with Me: Jay reluctantly takes Phil out to fly his new model plane, but a manoeuvre goes awry...

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: The Incident: Claire and Mitchell's mother, Dede, drops in for a surprise visit and is determined to make amends with everyone who she offended during 'the incident'.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Pygmoelian: After he's snubbed for a Duff beer calendar, Moe goes for plastic surgery and ends up so handsome that he becomes a soap star.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart to the Future: Bart foresees his adult future as a struggling rock guitarist crashing on Ralph Wiggum's couch, while Lisa becomes President.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Propagation Proposition: Penny's ex-boyfriend Zack and his wife want a baby, but when they encounter fertility problems, they ask Leonard for his help.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Confirmation Polarization: Sheldon and Amy are thrilled when their super-asymmetry theory is proved correct. Bernadette enjoys some big success at work.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Meteorite Manifestation: Sheldon is thrilled to help Howard and Bernadette with some bureaucratic paperwork, until he realises they are breaking the law.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Mountain of Madness: An avalanche traps Homer and Mr Burns in a mountain cabin during a team-building exercise.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Last of the Red Hat Mamas: Marge joins a women's group after Homer humiliates her at a party and her old friends shun her. But are her new friends all they seem to be?

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Marge's Son Poisoning: Bart gets picked on at school for riding a tandem with Marge.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: See Homer Run: To make amends for dismissing Lisa's Father's Day gift, Homer dons a Safety Salamander suit for a campaign at her school - and ends up running for mayor.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Brand new series - Mother and Child Reunion: In the future, Lisa makes a shock decision about college that hurts Marge and leads to a surprising place.

programme.title: Terminator: Dark Fate
programme.desc: (2019) Sci-fi action sequel with Linda Hamilton and Arnold Schwarzenegger. A factory worker is targeted by deadly robot assassins from the future. Thank goodness he's back.

programme.title: Brussels, My Love?
programme.desc: From the economy to the climate and the EU's role in world affairs, this talk show sheds light on European affairs and the issues that impact on our daily lives as Europeans.

programme.title: Vengeance
programme.desc: (2022) BJ Novak's comedy thriller. A big-city journalist is called to rural Texas after the girlfriend he doesn't have dies. Was it murder? Is there a podcast in it? With Ashton Kutcher.

programme.title: Hear My Song
programme.desc: (1991) Unashamedly romantic comedy starring Ned Beatty as Josef Locke, a 1950s singer with a voice that makes women weep... in a good way. Co-starring Adrian Dunbar.

programme.title: Battle of the Sexes
programme.desc: (2017) Comedy-drama based on the true story of self-proclaimed chauvinist Bobby Riggs challenging Billie Jean King to a tennis match to prove men are best. With Steve Carell and Emma Stone.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The Ghost and Mrs Muir
programme.desc: (1947) Supernatural romance starring Rex Harrison as the spirit of a gruff sea captain who haunts widow Gene Tierney, only for her to fall in love with him. Directed by Joseph L Mankiewicz.

programme.title: The Cockleshell Heroes
programme.desc: (1955) World War II drama. In a true-life tale of incredible bravery, ten marines try to break the blockade of Bordeaux. With Jos Ferrer, Trevor Howard, Victor Maddern and Anthony Newley.

programme.title: The Swimmer
programme.desc: (1968) Burt Lancaster stars as the angst-ridden middle-aged man who decides to swim home via neighbour's pools in Frank and Eleanor Perry's superb allegorical drama.

programme.title: Anne of the Indies
programme.desc: (1951) Jean Peters plays the title role of a brave buccaneer who falls for Captain LaRochelle (Louis Jourdan) without realising he has been planted in her crew to capture her.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom...
programme.desc: ...of the Crystal Skull: (2008) Steven Spielberg's action adventure with Harrison Ford and Cate Blanchett. Indy must stop the KGB from gaining the power held in the lost city of Eldorado.

programme.title: Conan the Barbarian
programme.desc: (2011) Fantasy action-adventure. Jason Momoa stars as Conan, who sets out to kill the evil warlord who massacred his village when he was young. With Stephen Lang and Rose McGowan.

programme.title: Boss Level
programme.desc: (2020) Groundhog day shoot 'em up with Frank Grillo, Naomi Watts and Mel Gibson. Ray gets killed every day. Can he escape by unravelling the mystery of why a bunch of people want him dead?

programme.title: Rules Don't Apply
programme.desc: (2016) Warren Beatty's 1950s-set romance starring Lily Collins. Reclusive billionaire Howard Hughes (Beatty) brings a young woman to Hollywood. Will she find the fame she's dreaming of?

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The War Lover
programme.desc: (1962) War film with Steve McQueen and Robert Wagner. A US pilot stationed in Britain during WWII alienates his comrades with his self-serving antics.

programme.title: Von Ryan's Express
programme.desc: (1965) Second World War adventure. Frank Sinatra stars as the leader of Allied prisoners of war attempting to slip the clutches of their Italian captors. Co-starring Trevor Howard.

programme.title: Yesterday's Enemy
programme.desc: (1959) Wartime drama with Stanley Baker. The captain of a British army patrol deciphers secret enemy battle plans, but does so at a great moral cost.

programme.title: The Bravados
programme.desc: (1958) Brooding western starring Joan Collins and Gregory Peck. A man hunts down the four escaped prisoners who he believes are responsible for the murder of his wife.

programme.title: The Old Man and the Gun
programme.desc: (2018) Crime biopic. Robert Redford stars as charming 74-year-old robber Forrest Tucker. He's still robbing banks when he falls for farmer Jewel (Sissy Spacek). But the cops still want him.

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: (2016) Action-thriller sequel with Tom Cruise, Cobie Smulders and Danika Yarosh. Vigilante Jack Reacher gets simultaneously caught up in a deadly conspiracy and a paternity case.

programme.title: Raging Grace
programme.desc: (2023) Gothic horror with Max Eigenmann. A Filipina cleaner takes a job in a big, creepy house so she and her daughter can stay in the UK. But there's an old man in a coma in the attic...

programme.title: Hearts of Darkness: A...
programme.desc: ...Filmmaker's Apocalypse: (1991) Documentary charting the problems that plagued the Apocalypse Now shoot, threatening this cinematic landmark, Coppola's career and even one actor's life.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The Nevadan
programme.desc: (1950) Western with Randolph Scott and Dorothy Malone. A cunning US Marshal pretends to be a doofus to get a bank robber to take him to the hidden loot.

programme.title: Hangman's Knot
programme.desc: (1952) Civil War-era Western. A unit of Confederate soldiers attack a Union troop to steal gold. Learning that the war is over, they must finish the mission in disguise.

programme.title: Fire Down Below
programme.desc: (1957) Drama with Rita Hayworth, Robert Mitchum and Jack Lemmon. Two friends agree to smuggle a mysterious European woman across the border, but she soon has them at each other's throats.

programme.title: Sink the Bismarck!
programme.desc: (1960) Second World War drama. Kenneth More stars as the British captain charged with finding and destroying the Bismarck, Germany's largest battleship. Directed by Lewis Gilbert.

programme.title: Deep Impact
programme.desc: (1998) Elijah Wood and Morgan Freeman star in the sci-fi disaster movie about impending meteorite-related disaster, attempts to destroy it, and possibly some cataclysmic havoc.

programme.title: Apocalypse Now
programme.desc: (1979) Final cut of Coppola's award-laden take on the Vietnam War, with Martin Sheen and Marlon Brando. An assassin travels upriver to terminate a renegade colonel with extreme prejudice.

programme.title: Ainsley's National Trust Cook Off
programme.desc: Ainsley Harriott is joined by chefs Ben Ebbrell and Cyrus Todiwala in the kitchen garden of Blickling Hall in Norfolk to see who can create and cook the Dish of the Day. Ainsley showcases stripey tomatoes picked from the Blickling greenhouse in his pan-fried mackerel, tomato and pomegranate salad, Ben brings his Latin American influences to the kitchen with his summer courgette chilaquiles with pico de gallo, and Cyrus creates an Indian taste sensation with his spicy chicken thighs and veg

programme.title: Weight Loss Jab: Getting to the Right People? Tonight
programme.desc: Unless things change, more than half of the population will be classed as overweight or obese by 2050. With soaring demand for weight loss injections, Ranvir Singh investigates who is getting them and whether tighter restrictions regarding online prescribing will work

programme.title: The Undercover Police Scandal: Love and Lies Exposed
programme.desc: A mutual friend introduces Helen and Alison, and they work out that their former partners must have belonged to a Metropolitan Police squad that infiltrated left-wing groups. No-one is interested in their story and both women are forced to move on with their lives. Seven years later, an online post finally unmasks former officer Mark Kennedy, whose undercover name was Mark Stone

programme.title: World Cup Qualifier
programme.desc: England v Albania (Kick-off 7.45pm). Mark Pougatch presents coverage of both teams' opening Group K match, held at Wembley Stadium. This is Thomas Tuchel's first match as head coach of England and he will be expecting to get off to a winning start in a group that also contains Serbia, Latvia and Andorra. The teams were also in the same qualifying group for the 2022 World Cup, when England overcame the Albanians 2-0 in Tirana and 5-0 here. With analysis from Roy Keane and Ian Wright, and commentary by Sam Matterface and Lee Dixon

programme.title: ITV News at Ten
programme.desc: A fresh perspective on the major stories of the day, featuring national and international news, with reports and analysis from ITV's correspondents

programme.title: Long Lost Family: Born Without Trace
programme.desc: Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell follow the stories of foundlings as they search for answers about why they were left as babies and try to find their birth families. A police detective left on church steps as a baby, who has been unable to solve the mystery of his own identity, finally discovers the truth. Elsewhere, a woman left in a hospital in the 1960s receives surprising news about her birth family

programme.title: Scotland Tonight
programme.desc: Current affairs programme delving into stories beyond the headlines. Featuring live studio debates and comprehensive analysis, it sheds light on key stories impacting the nation and its surroundings

programme.title: The British Airways Killer
programme.desc: First of a two-part documentary examining the disappearance of Joanna Simpson in 2010, telling the story of an investigation that changed British legal history and led to a tragic discovery. The morning after she went missing, her British Airways captain husband Robert Brown made a 999 call to report a domestic issue, but despite handing himself in, he then refused to help the police with their investigation

programme.title: World Cup Qualifier
programme.desc: England v Albania (Kick-off 7.45pm). Mark Pougatch presents coverage of both teams' opening Group K match, held at Wembley Stadium. This is Thomas Tuchel's first match as head coach of England and he will be expecting to get off to a winning start in a group that also contains Serbia, Latvia and Andorra. The teams were also in the same qualifying group for the 2022 World Cup, when England overcame the Albanians 2-0 in Tirana and 5-0 here. With analysis from Roy Keane and Ian Wright, and commentary by Sam Matterface and Lee Dixon

programme.title: ITV News at Ten
programme.desc: A fresh perspective on the major stories of the day, featuring national and international news, with reports and analysis from ITV's correspondents

programme.title: Long Lost Family: Born Without Trace
programme.desc: Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell follow the stories of foundlings as they search for answers about why they were left as babies and try to find their birth families. programme.title: Scotland Tonight
programme.desc: Current affairs programme delving into stories beyond the headlines. Featuring live studio debates and comprehensive analysis, it sheds light on key stories impacting the nation and its surroundings

programme.title: The British Airways Killer
programme.desc: First of a two-part documentary examining the disappearance of Joanna Simpson in 2010, telling the story of an investigation that changed British legal history and led to a tragic discovery. The morning after she went missing, her British Airways captain husband Robert Brown made a 999 call to report a domestic issue, but despite handing himself in, he then refused to help the police with their investigation

programme.title: Ainsley's National Trust Cook Off
programme.desc: Ainsley Harriott is joined by chefs Ben Ebbrell and Cyrus Todiwala in the kitchen garden of Blickling Hall in Norfolk to see who can create and cook the Dish of the Day. Ainsley showcases stripey tomatoes picked from the Blickling greenhouse in his pan-fried mackerel, tomato and pomegranate salad, Ben brings his Latin American influences to the kitchen with his summer courgette chilaquiles with pico de gallo, and Cyrus creates an Indian taste sensation with his spicy chicken thighs and veg

programme.desc: A widow reluctantly parts with her husband's treasured collection of Rolls Royces and Bentleys, and an impulse buyer finds one of the cars a new home.

programme.title: Bangers & Cash
programme.desc: Derek's running late as usual, to collect a Triumph TR8 from Kirkby Stephen East Railway Station, with vintage engine ride thrown in for good measure.

programme.title: Bangers & Cash
programme.desc: Derek is reunited with the vehicle he took his driving test in - a 1957 Ford 100E Estate. Dave is also on the trail for an Escort, this time a 1970s Mk1 twin cam.

programme.title: Bangers & Cash
